titleStmt.title: By the Major. Wee charge and command you, that upon S. Thomas day the apostle next comming, you doe hold your ward mote, ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Richard Cotes, Printer to the Honourable City of London,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening lines of text.
Place of publication and printer from colophon; publication date from Wing.
Includes: An act for the reformation of divers abuses, used in the Wardmote Enquests.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
